scripts.cypress:open:homologacao:chrome: cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=homologacao cypress open --env configFile=homologacao --browser chrome
scripts.cypress:open:homologacao:firefox: cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=homologacao cypress open --env configFile=homologacao --browser firefox
scripts.cypress:open:homologacao:edge: cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=homologacao cypress open --env configFile=homologacao --browser edge
scripts.cypress:open:staging:chrome: cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=staging cypress open --env configFile=staging --browser chrome
scripts.cypress:open:staging:firefox: cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=staging cypress open --env configFile=staging --browser firefox
scripts.cypress:open:staging:edge: cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=staging cypress open --env configFile=staging --browser edge
scripts.cypress:open:producao:chrome: cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=producao cypress open --env configFile=producao --browser chrome
scripts.cypress:open:producao:firefox: cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=producao cypress open --env configFile=producao --browser firefox
scripts.cypress:open:producao:edge: cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=producao cypress open --env configFile=producao --browser edge
scripts.cypress:run:homologacao:chrome: cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=homologacao cypress run --env configFile=homologacao --browser chrome
scripts.cypress:run:homologacao:firefox: cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=homologacao cypress run --env configFile=homologacao --browser firefox
scripts.cypress:run:homologacao:edge: cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=homologacao cypress run --env configFile=homologacao --browser edge
scripts.cypress:run:staging:chrome: cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=staging cypress run --env configFile=staging --browser chrome
scripts.cypress:run:staging:firefox: cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=staging cypress run --env configFile=staging --browser firefox
scripts.cypress:run:staging:edge: cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=staging cypress run --env configFile=staging --browser edge
scripts.cypress:run:producao:chrome: cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=producao cypress run --env configFile=producao --browser chrome
scripts.cypress:run:producao:firefox: cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=producao cypress run --env configFile=producao --browser firefox
scripts.cypress:run:producao:edge: cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=producao cypress run --env configFile=producao --browser edge
scripts.cypress:run:all-browsers:staging: npm run cypress:run:staging:chrome && npm run cypress:run:staging:firefox && npm run cypress:run:staging:edge
scripts.cypress:run:all-browsers:homologacao: npm run cypress:run:homologacao:chrome && npm run cypress:run:homologacao:firefox && npm run cypress:run:homologacao:edge
scripts.cypress:run:all-browsers:producao: npm run cypress:run:producao:chrome && npm run cypress:run:producao:firefox && npm run cypress:run:producao:edge
scripts.cypress:run:homologacao:allure:chrome: cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=homologacao cypress run --env configFile=homologacao,allure=true --browser chrome && powershell -File .\executar-allure.ps1 -Browser Chrome
scripts.cypress:run:homologacao:allure:firefox: cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=homologacao cypress run --env configFile=homologacao,allure=true --browser firefox && powershell -File .\executar-allure.ps1 -Browser Firefox
scripts.cypress:run:homologacao:allure:edge: cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=homologacao cypress run --env configFile=homologacao,allure=true --browser edge && powershell -File .\executar-allure.ps1 -Browser Edge
scripts.cypress:run:staging:allure:chrome: cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=staging cypress run --env configFile=staging,allure=true --browser chrome && powershell -File .\executar-allure.ps1 -Browser Chrome
scripts.cypress:run:staging:allure:firefox: cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=staging cypress run --env configFile=staging,allure=true --browser firefox && powershell -File .\executar-allure.ps1 -Browser Firefox
scripts.cypress:run:staging:allure:edge: cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=staging cypress run --env configFile=staging,allure=true --browser edge && powershell -File .\executar-allure.ps1 -Browser Edge
scripts.cypress:run:producao:allure:chrome: cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=producao cypress run --env configFile=producao,allure=true --browser chrome && powershell -File .\executar-allure.ps1 -Browser Chrome
scripts.cypress:run:producao:allure:firefox: cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=producao cypress run --env configFile=producao,allure=true --browser firefox && powershell -File .\executar-allure.ps1 -Browser Firefox
scripts.cypress:run:producao:allure:edge: cross-env CYPRESS_ENV=producao cypress run --env configFile=producao,allure=true --browser edge && powershell -File .\executar-allure.ps1 -Browser Edge
scripts.cypress:run:all-browsers:staging:allure: npm run cypress:run:staging:allure:chrome && npm run cypress:run:staging:allure:firefox && npm run cypress:run:staging:allure:edge && powershell -File .\executar-allure.ps1 -Browser "Chrome, Firefox, Edge" -Stand Staging && npm run allure:report
scripts.cypress:run:all-browsers:homologacao:all: npm run cypress:run:homologacao:allure:chrome && npm run cypress:run:homologacao:allure:firefox && npm run cypress:run:homologacao:allure:edge && powershell -File .\executar-allure.ps1 -Browser "Chrome, Firefox, Edge" -Stand Homologacao && npm run allure:report
scripts.cypress:run:all-browsers:producao:allure: npm run cypress:run:producao:allure:chrome && npm run cypress:run:producao:allure:firefox && npm run cypress:run:producao:allure:edge && powershell -File .\executar-allure.ps1 -Browser "Chrome, Firefox, Edge" -Stand Producao && npm run allure:report
scripts.allure:report: npm run allure:generate && npm run allure:open
scripts.allure:executor: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); fs.writeFileSync('allure-results/executor.json', JSON.stringify({name: 'Ivan Santos', type: 'local', buildName: 'Ivan'}))"
scripts.allure:prepare: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); fs.mkdirSync('allure-results', { recursive: true }); fs.writeFileSync('allure-results/executor.json', JSON.stringify({name: 'Ivan Santos', type: 'local', buildName: 'Automação Amei', buildOrder: '1'}))"
